  • Method Details

    • setCineplexManager

      public void setCineplexManager(Controller.CineplexManager cineplexManager)
      Change the Cineplex Manager referenced by this manager
      Parameters:
      cineplexManager - This controller's newly set Cineplex Manager

    • getCineplexManager

      public Controller.CineplexManager getCineplexManager()
      Gets the Cineplex Manager referenced by this manager
      Returns:
      CineplexManager This controller's Cineplex Manager

    • createCinema

      public void createCinema(String cinemaName, String cineplexName, String code, Model.CinemaType cinemaType, Model.SeatList seatList)
      Create a new Cinema and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new Cinema object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write Cinema object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      cineplexName - Name of Cineplex to add this Cinema
      code - Code of this cinema
      cinemaType - Type of this cinema
      seatList - Seating plan of this cinema

    • getAllCinema

      public ArrayList<Model.Cinema> getAllCinema()
      Read every Cinema in the database file and return them
      Returns:
      Model.Cinema Return list of Cinemas if found, else empty list

    • getCinemaOfCineplex

      public ArrayList<Model.Cinema> getCinemaOfCineplex(String cineplexName)
      Read every Cinema in the database file and return them
      Parameters:
      cineplexName - Name of cineplex to find
      Returns:
      Model.Cinema Return list of Cinemas if found, else empty list

    • getCinema

      public ArrayList<Model.Cinema> getCinema(int choice, Object attribute)
      Read every Cinema based on an attribute in the Database file and return them
      Parameters:
      choice - Given attribute to be check for (based on constant as defined)
      attribute - Value of given attribute to be searched
      Returns:
      Model.Cinema Return list of Cinemas if any, else empty list

    • updateCinema

      public void updateCinema(int choice, String code, Object newValue)
      Update a Cinema with new input attribute and cinema code in database file
      Parameters:
      choice - Attribute input to be checked (based on constant as defined)
      code - Code of cinema to be updated
      newValue - New value of cinema's attribute

    • removeCinema

      public void removeCinema(String code)
      Delete a Cinema corresponding with the cinema code from the database file
      Parameters:
      code - Code of cinema to be deleted
